data.name: The Pied Piper of Gamelin Demo
data.detailed_description: This is a 3D remake of Snake. For this reason, the gameplay has a number of differences that give the game originality. The trailer provides an overview, and the demo version provides an opportunity to experience the gameplay directly.
data.about_the_game: This is a 3D remake of Snake. For this reason, the gameplay has a number of differences that give the game originality. The trailer provides an overview, and the demo version provides an opportunity to experience the gameplay directly.
data.short_description: Casual third person game. In fact, this is a remake of the Snake, but there are significant differences. The demo version allows you to directly feel the process of interaction of the game with the user and evaluate the work of the controller.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in or better

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
